name: web-stego
description: Web tool in order to encrypt an image using LSB algorithm

scripts.serve: echo '[!] Running dev server on 3030' && cd dist && python3 -m http.server 3030
scripts.devbuild: rm -rf ./dist; mkdir dist; cp -r src/img dist; cp ./index.html dist/ ; npx webpack --config webpack.dev.js

author: Alejandro García Peláez
